personal.name: Aaditya Chandra Gupta
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: Passionate software developer with expertise in building modern web applications. I love creating elegant solutions to complex problems and staying updated with the latest technologies.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with real-time inventory management, secure payment integration, and admin dashboard.

projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, user authentication, and productivity analytics.

projects.title: AI Chat Application
projects.description: Real-time chat application with AI-powered responses, message history, and multiple conversation threads.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard for visualizing complex datasets with various chart types and real-time data updates.

experience.description: Led development of scalable web applications serving 100k+ users. Mentored junior developers and implemented best practices.
Developed and maintained multiple React applications with Node.js backends. Collaborated with design and product teams.
Built frontend features using React and contributed to backend API development with Node.js.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a passionate software developer with 4+ years of experience in building modern web applications.
paragraphs: I specialize in full-stack development with a focus on creating user-friendly interfaces and scalable backend systems. My journey in tech started with a curiosity about how things work, which evolved into a professional career.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or writing technical blogs. I believe in continuous learning and sharing knowledge with the community.
I'm always open to exciting opportunities and collaborations. Whether you need a developer for your project or just want to chat about tech, feel free to reach out!
